variable.name: subj_id
variable.description: Deidentified Subjects ID

variable.name: protocol
variable.description: Study name

variable.name: base_vnum
variable.description: Visit number used for Baseline visit. In most studies, this was the visit of randomization but in some studies treatment was given before randomization so the Baseline visit is the first visit prior to any treatment being given.

variable.name: case_control
variable.description: Affection status

variable.name: case_control_peak
variable.description: Affection status in PEAK

variable.name: gender
variable.description: Gender of participant

variable.name: race
variable.description: Race of participant

variable.name: age_baseline
variable.description: Age at Baseline. (visit date - date of birth) / 365.25

variable.name: age_onset
variable.description: Age at first asthma symptoms. This is the midpoint of the 10-year age of onset categories from the ACRN age of onset field.

variable.name: htcm_baseline
variable.description: Baseline Standing Height (cm)

variable.name: wtkg_baseline
variable.description: Baseline Weight (kg)

variable.name: bmi_baseline
variable.description: Baseline BMI (kg/m^2)

variable.name: bmiz_baseline
variable.description: Baseline BMIZ

variable.name: tx_grp
variable.description: Treatment group as assigned at Baseline.

variable.name: saba_tx_grp
variable.description: Treatment group assigned at Baseline was SABA arm

variable.name: laba_tx_grp
variable.description: Treatment group assigned at Baseline was LABA arm

variable.name: cs_tx_grp
variable.description: Treatment group assigned at Baseline was steroid arm

variable.name: cs_combo_tx_grp
variable.description: Participant assigned to Combination Therapy Group (Steroid Treatment + other)

variable.name: cs_dose
variable.description: Corticosteroid dose

variable.name: clinic_city
variable.description: City of the clinic. Note that the city may be the same, but clinics between CAMP, CARE, and ACRN studies are different and may have measurements may vary slightly. In order to distinguish between the CAMP, ACRN, and CARE data include the variable protocol along with clinic. Protocol is the project.

variable.name: smoke
variable.description: Participant smoked during trial

variable.name: env_smoke
variable.description: Either parent smoked during trial

variable.name: env_smoke_pretrial
variable.description: Home exposure to smoke prior to trial enrollment

variable.name: ius
variable.description: In Utero Smoke. Mother smoked when pregnant with participant.

variable.name: tot_pred_bursts
variable.description: Total prednisone bursts during trial

variable.name: pred_bursts_event1_month
variable.description: Number of months from Baseline to first prednisone burst. This is calculated by dividing the number of days between Baseline and the first prednisone burst by 30.25.

variable.name: pred_bursts_event1_week
variable.description: Number of weeks from Baseline to first prednisone burst. This is calculated by dividing the number of days between Baseline and the first prednisone burst by 7.

variable.name: pred_bursts_event2_month
variable.description: Number of months from Baseline to second prednisone burst. This is calculated by dividing the number of days between Baseline and the second prednisone burst by 30.25.

variable.name: pred_bursts_event2_week
variable.description: Number of weeks from Baseline to second prednisone burst. This is calculated by dividing the number of days between Baseline and the second prednisone burst by 7.

variable.name: tot_edhos
variable.description: Total ER visit or hospitalization during trial

variable.name: edhos_event1_month
variable.description: No. of months from Baseline to first ER visit or Hospitalization. See month assignments in pred_bursts_event1_month.

variable.name: edhos_event1_week
variable.description: Number of weeks from Baseline to first ER visit or Hospitalization. See week assignments in pred_bursts_event1_week.

variable.name: edhos_event2_month
variable.description: Number of months from Baseline to second ER visit or Hospitalization. See month assignments in pred_bursts_event1_month.

variable.name: edhos_event2_week
variable.description: Number of weeks from Baseline to second ER visit or Hospitalization. See week assignments in pred_bursts_event1_week.

variable.name: prech_long
variable.description: Long term change in Pre-FEV1 between Baseline and a year after Baseline. The calculation is: 100*(Month12 PREFEV - Baseline PREFEV)/Baseline PREFEV.

variable.name: prech_short
variable.description: Short term change in Pre-FEV1 between Baseline and two months after Baseline. The calculation is: 100*(Month2 PREFEV - Baseline PREFEV)/Baseline PREFEV.

variable.name: eno_baseline
variable.description: Baseline exhaled nitric oxide (ppb)

variable.name: pc20_baseline
variable.description: Baseline FEV1 PC20 meth (mg/ml)

variable.name: lnpc20_baseline
variable.description: Natural log PC20 at Baseline

variable.name: prefev_baseline
variable.description: Baseline FEV1

variable.name: prefvc_baseline
variable.description: Baseline FVC

variable.name: preff_baseline
variable.description: Baseline FEV1/FVC ratio

variable.name: prefevpp_baseline
variable.description: Baseline FEV1 percent predicted
variable.comment: For references and explanations of the predicted equations used, see old_predicted_equations.pdf and new_predicted_equations.pdf

variable.name: prefevppnew_baseline
variable.description: Baseline FEV1 percent predicted (new equations only)
variable.comment: For references and explanations of the predicted equations used, see new_predicted_equations.pdf

variable.name: prefvcpp_baseline
variable.description: Baseline FVC percent predicted
variable.comment: For references and explanations of the predicted equations used, see old_predicted_equations.pdf and new_predicted_equations.pdf

variable.name: bdrabpct_baseline
variable.description: Baseline Bronchodilator percent change. The calculation is: 100*(POSFEV - PREFEV)/PREFEV.

variable.name: maxbdrabpct_baseline
variable.description: Baseline Maximum Bronchodilator percent change. The calculation is: 100*(MAXPOSFEV - PREFEV)/PREFEV.

variable.name: atopy
variable.description: Child had atopic dermatitis for 2 yrs and was seen by a doctor for it.

variable.name: eos_baseline
variable.description: Baseline blood eosinophils (mm^3)

variable.name: log10eos_baseline
variable.description: Basline Log10 blood eosinophils

variable.name: ige_baseline
variable.description: Baseline Total IgE (ng/ml)

variable.name: log10ige_baseline
variable.description: Baseline Log10 IgE

variable.name: ampf_baseline
variable.description: Average Baseline AM peak flow (L/min) as recorded in daily diary card data between visits. Average of daily measurements up to 4 weeks prior to visit with a minimum of 7 days.

variable.name: totres_baseline
variable.description: Baseline total rescue use per day (puffs) as recorded in daily diary card data between visits. Average of daily measurements up to 4 weeks prior to visit with a minimum of 7 days.

variable.name: amsym_baseline
variable.description: Average Baseline AM symptoms as recorded in daily diary card data between visits. Maximum of daily wheezing and coughing then average of daily measurements up to 4 weeks prior to visit with a minimum of 7 days.

variable.name: pos_skintest_baseline
variable.description: One or more skintest positive at Baseline

variable.name: nall_skintest_baseline
variable.description: No. of skin tests (all tests) at Baseline

variable.name: npos_skintest_baseline
variable.description: No. of pos skin tests (all tests) at Baseline
